conversation.content: Welcome to my little shop! Please, sit down and let's talk about your future. What would you like to know about the future of technology?
How will robots change our lives?
Robots will help us with many tasks, like cleaning and cooking. They will also work in hospitals and help doctors with operations. But, they might also take some jobs away from people.
Will robots be in every home?

Yes, robots will be in many homes, helping with tasks like cleaning, taking care of children, and even cooking meals. Some humans may even have robots that help them with their health and wellbeing, like robots that can check your blood pressure and other things.

Robots will be affordable for many people, but some high-tech robots will still be expensive. They will be like cars, some people will buy the basic model, and others will buy the luxury model with extra features.
Will robots be easy to use?

Robots will be designed to be easy to use, even for people who are not very good with technology. They will have simple interfaces and will be able to learn from you, so you can teach them how to do things your way.
